text: Arnis () is the smallest town in Germany both by population and by area.Hoch im Norden: Arnis ist Deutschlands kleinste Stadt – n-tv.de About 300 people live there and its area is 0.45 km². It is part of the Amt Kappeln-Land in Schleswig-Flensburg in Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Arnis Category:Towns in Schleswig-Holstein
title: Arnis, Germany
